做.definition: to make; to produce; to write; to compose; to do; to engage in; to hold (a party etc); (of a person) to be (an intermediary, a good student etc); to become (husband and wife, friends etc); (of a thing) to serve as; to be used for; to assume (an air or manner)

做一天和尚撞一天鐘.pinyin: zuo4 yi1 tian1 he2 shang5 zhuang4 yi1 tian1 zhong1
做一天和尚撞一天鐘.definition: lit. as a monk for today, toll today's bell (idiom); fig. to do one's job mechanically; to hold a position passively

做事.definition: to work; to handle matters; to have a job

做人.definition: to conduct oneself; to behave with integrity

做人情.definition: to do a favor to sb

做伴.definition: to keep sb company; to accompany

做伴兒.definition: erhua variant of 做伴[zuo4 ban4]

做功.definition: (physics) to do work; non-vocal acting (in traditional Chinese opera)

做壽.definition: to celebrate a birthday (of an elderly person)

做夢.definition: to dream; to have a dream; fig. illusion; fantasy; pipe dream

做大.definition: arrogant; to put on airs; (business etc) to expand; to enlarge; to do sth on a big scale

做好做歹.definition: to persuade using all possible arguments (idiom); to act good cop and bad cop in turn

做媒.definition: to act as go-between (between prospective marriage partners etc)

做學問.definition: to study; to engage in scholarship

做完.definition: to finish; to complete the task

做官.definition: to take an official post; to become a government employee

做客.definition: to be a guest or visitor

做小抄.definition: to prepare a crib sheet; to crib; to cheat by copying

做工.definition: to work with one's hands; manual work; workmanship

做工作.definition: to do one's work; to work on sb; to try to persuade sb

做廳長.definition: (jocular) to sleep on the couch; to sleep in the living room

做張做勢.definition: to put on an act (idiom); to pose; to show theatrical affectation; to indulge in histrionics

做張做智.definition: to put on an act (idiom); to pose; to show theatrical affectation; to indulge in histrionics

做張做致.definition: see 做張做智|做张做智[zuo4 zhang1 zuo4 zhi4]

做戲.definition: to act in a play; to put on a play

做手.definition: to put one's hand to sth; to set about; skillful hands; worker; writer

做手腳.definition: to manipulate dishonestly; to tamper with sth

做掉.definition: to kill; to get rid of; (sports) to defeat; to eliminate

做操.definition: to do exercises; to do gymnastics

做文章.definition: to make an issue of sth; to fuss; to make a song and dance

做法.definition: way of handling sth; method for making; work method; recipe; practice; CL:個|个[ge4]

做活.definition: to work for a living (esp. of woman needleworker); life of a group of stones in Go 圍棋|围棋[wei2 qi2]

做活兒.definition: erhua variant of 做活[zuo4 huo2]

做派.definition: way of doing sth; behavior; to act in an affected manner; mannerism; gestures in opera

做滿月.definition: to celebrate a child reaching the age of one month

做為.definition: to act as; used erroneously for 作為|作为

做牛做馬.definition: lit. to work like an ox, to work like a horse; fig. to work extremely hard

做球.definition: to set up a teammate (with an opportunity to score); to throw a game

做生活.definition: to work; to do manual labor

做眼.definition: (in the game of Go) to make an "eye"; to serve as eyes and ears (i.e. go and seek out information); to be a scout

做眼色.definition: to give sb a meaningful look

做禮拜.definition: to worship; to pray (esp. in a regular religious gathering at a church or mosque)

做絕.definition: to go to extremes; to leave no room for maneuver

做臉.definition: to win honor; to put on a stern face; to have a facial (beauty treatment)

做舊.definition: to give (sth) an antique look; to artificially age; to distress

做親.definition: to become related by marriage; to marry

做買賣.definition: to buy and sell; to do business; to trade; to deal

做賊心虛.definition: to feel guilty as a thief (idiom); to have sth on one's conscience

做雞.definition: (slang) (of a woman) to work as a prostitute

做飯.definition: to prepare a meal; to cook

做鬼.definition: to play tricks; to cheat; to get up to mischief; to become a ghost; to give up the ghost

做鬼臉.definition: to pull a face; to grimace; to scowl

做鴨.definition: (slang) (of a man) to work as a prostitute
